content.description: Just to the right of Hippies In The Soup which starts on an undercling, Mad Snail Disease stand starts on a horizontal rail. Lift off and manage to plant feet or reach for the next good rail. Use the path of least resistance and topout just left of the protruding block.
content.protection: 1-2 pads and a spotter depending on XP
content.location: Just to the right of Hippies In The Soup. Take the oath of least resistance up and to the right following the beat holds.

content.description: Hippies In The Soup stand starts with both hands matched on a slanted Undercling crimp that faces at 7 o clock. Establish control and pull on slimps and rails taking the direct line to the apex of the boulder.  The loose pedestal rock is not a part of the problem.
content.location: Stand under the highest point of the boulder. Left of your centerline there will be a slanted Undercling to match on and a foot to smear on. Stay off the loose pedestal rock.

content.description: Dermataxed Hippies runs up the thin undulating north face of Taste Peace boulder which faces Juji Fruit.Eyeball the lower rail of the bloc which floats off the slab 6-8”. Start to the right in the alcove made by the saplings, the face, and boulders behind.Get established on thin crimps and work left on the foot slab nodes and thin razors, crystals, and credit cards.  Now on the left side of this slab stance figure out the moves up the face.Tall climbers (72”+ AI) will have access to a completely different beta than normal or shorter folks. Still, each variation is challenging and requires precision and a range of skills.One of the best Full Package problems on Mount Scott and the Refuge for that matter. Will receive shade even on summer days (sunrise to ~10 AM and ~2 PM to sunset). Midday the face is partially shaded.***MP grade is simply a placeholder so don’t get hung up on it - John and Miles will run more laps on it before making a call as well as inviting others to try it out. With the skills demanded by this problem it will be good to get more folks on it. It’s not simply a Pull problem***
content.location: North face of Taste Peace boulder which faces Juji Fruit.

content.description: 3 Headed Duck is a tricky line of a few hard moves that leads to easier climbing up top.Start on a left hand crimp and a right hand on a slanted SLIMP. Work magic feet below and control the start before climbing to easier moves.When you get in position with the available holds you may feel like a 3 Headed Duck.Best bomb in the refuge. Stupid, fun, and hard.
content.protection: 1-2 pads and spotter depending on XP
content.location: Just to the right of Mad Snail Disease on the NE slab face of Taste Peace boulder. Around the arete to the right on the north face is the techy problem Dermataxed Hippies.

content.description: Taste Peace boulder immediately catches your eye with lots of horizontal grooves and apparent crimps - quite rare to see so many features in the Refuge laid out so generously to climbing!Upon further inspection these rails mostly turn out to be slimps with a handful of bomber jugs spaced out.Two straightforward lines go up the east face’s slab and another trick line starts on crimps to the right just before the Arete. Around the corner on the north face a very technical problem reminiscent of 400F or Black Scratch original from Quartz waits to test your skills.1 minute approach from parking and lines from V0-V5. ***this is not in the Pullout Game Area which is below the road - this is south of Juji Fruit and may be added to that area or The Hollow later by admins***
